item.description:
Fellow professionals:
Come and enjoy a night filled with exciting conversations with dynamic professionals over cocktails brought to you by NetSAP Boston. Come hangout with us and support the Crossover Basketball and Scholars Academy this Friday, March 22nd at 8PM.
NetSAP Boston is proud to collaborate with the Crossover Basketball and Scholars Academy which helps leverage basketball athletic values and skill as a means to develop academic opportunities for Indian students. Come help support this organization and help raise proceeds for a great cause!
Particulars:
Date: Friday, March 22nd – 8:00pm
Venue: Via Matta Restaurant 79 Park Plaza, Boston, MA
Yummy light appetizers will be served at Via Matta!

Members: Free | Non-Members: $10 (Pay at the door)
Sign-up for NetSAP Membership at http://na.netip.org/members/join
OR
Buy your membership at the venue
We look forward to seeing you this Friday.
With Best Wishes,
NetSAP Boston 2013 Executive Board
 ﻿﻿
item.name: NETSap Boston presents :A night of Cocktail and Conversations
